# Third-Party Libraries

This directory contains third-party libraries used by the firmware.

## lwIP
- Version: 2.2.1
- Source: https://savannah.nongnu.org/projects/lwip/
- License: BSD-style (see lwip/COPYING)
- Usage: TCP/IP stack for Ethernet communication

## STM32CubeH7
- Version: 1.11.5
- Source: https://www.st.com/en/embedded-software/stm32cube-h7.html
- License: BSD-style (see STM32CubeH7 license files)
- Usage: STM32H7 HAL drivers, CMSIS, BSP components

Only the files actually used by the firmware are included here.
Original distributions have been removed to reduce repository size.
